name: Magicball
0:
”Alexa, launch the magic ball.”
”Should I take the umbrella?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magic ball
des: This skill emulates the toy popularized in the 50s. To get started you can ask questions to the skill such as - Should I take the umbrella?, Should I go out for a party tonight? and many more. Specifically in a manner to which skill could response as "Yes" or "No" for an answer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
